activities:
Lumen21 Solutions are focused on Managed Services, Custom Application Development, Consulting Services and Infrastructure Services. Lumen21, through its heritage of being a vendor-neutral provider of information technology solutions, is uniquely positioned to provide infrastructure recommendations that solve business problems and allow for maximum flexibility. Lumen21 is partnered with top-tier technology partners that enable us to provide expertise on best of breed Technology products, coupled with architectural, design, and consulting services, allowing us to address the specific goals and objectives of your business.

We manage and handle other organizations data which may contain Personal Information including Protected Health Information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using American Arbitration Association at http://go.adr.org/safeharbor as a third party resolution provider.
